item.title: Project Transcalibur
item.description:
Downloads: Preprint Paper (PDF 7MB) // Movie (MP3 20MB) // Press Kit (ZIP Archive 20MB) Note: movie for CHI2019 is coming very soon…
Transcalibur: A Weight Shifting Virtual Reality Controller for 2D Shape Rendering based on Computational Perception Model Abstract Humans can estimate the shape of a wielded object through the illusory feeling of the mass properties of the object obtained using their hands. Even though the shape of hand-held objects influences immersion and realism in virtual reality (VR), it is difficult to design VR controllers for rendering desired shapes according to the perceptions derived from the illusory effects of mass properties and shape perception.
